metadata.text: the public alias of the other account holder
the private alias of the other account holder
short text explaining who the other party of the transaction is
a URL related to the other party e.g. the website of the company
an image URL related to the other party e.g. company logo
the company corporate URL in the http://nbg.gr/ web service

user.id: ID (given by the user's provider) of the user making the comment
user.provider: name of party that authorized the user e.g. bank_name/facebook/twitter

text.date: date of posting the geo tag
